headline: Jim Cramer Datadog: “We’re Going to Stay Away From These Enterprise Software Companies”
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under a microscope. Noting that the stock has been down, a caller asked about it, and Cramer replied: “We’re not, we’re going to stay away from these enterprise software companies. They seem to be almost in freefall, and I don’t need to break the […]
